name: REG_ABST_ESIGNATURE_META
description: Stores data about esignatures on a particular abstraction.

columns.name: REGISTRY_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the registry data record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ESIGNATURE_BLOB_KEY
columns.description: The blob key of an image of an esignature.

columns.name: ESIGNATURE_SIGNER
columns.description: The name displayed & associated with an esignature. This can be a legal, preferred, or specified name.

columns.name: ESIG_DUAL_SIGN_DEVC_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the device that captured the esignature

columns.name: ESIGN_DEVICE_DATA
columns.description: Stores a blob key to the device data, which is metadata sent to us by a particular device while capturing an esignature.

columns.name: ESIGN_CAPTURE_INST_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time in UTC when the e-signature was captured.

columns.name: ESIG_CAPTUREUSER_ID
columns.description: The logged in user when a particular signature was captured

columns.name: ESIG_CAPTUREUSER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.
